name: Luis Hernandez
brief_info: Luis Hernandez is an experienced language instructor with expertise in both Spanish and English. He has taken a total of 5 classes, including Spanish Beginners, Spanish Intermediate, Spanish Conversation, Spanish Grammar, and Spanish Culture. With his in-depth knowledge of both languages, Luis is dedicated to helping learners develop their fluency and cultural understanding. He believes that effective communication is key to language mastery and aims to guide his students towards proficiency in Spanish and English. Apart from his teaching commitments, Luis can be contacted via email at luis.hernandez@example.com. You can also connect with him on Facebook at [facebook link] and Instagram at [Instagram link].

Sophie's teaching approach focuses on helping students develop their language skills and achieve proficiency. For any inquiries, you can contact Sophie via email at sophie.dubois@example.com.
